text: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle (also known as Harold & Kumar Get the Munchies) is a 2004 American stoner comedy movie. It is the first movie in the Harold & Kumar series. It is directed by Danny Leiner. It stars John Cho, Kal Penn, Neil Patrick Harris, Fred Willard, Bobby Lee, Christopher Meloni, Ryan Reynolds and Malin Ã…kerman. It is written by Jon Hurwitz and Hayden Schlossberg. The movie was released on July 30, 2004 by Warner Bros. It received mixed reviews, but did well at the box office. The movie's sequel, Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay, was released on April 25, 2008 by Warner Bros. The movie is about two friends, Harold and Kumar, as they go to the fast food restaurant White Castle after smoking cannabis, but end up on a series of misadventures when they cannot find the restaurant. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2004 comedy movies Category:2004 adventure movies Category:2000s road movies Category:Buddy movies Category:English- language movies Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:American road movies Category:American comedy movies Category:New Line Cinema movies Category:Movies about cannabis Category:Movies directed by Danny Leiner
title: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
